name: do NOT fucking DIE
description:
do NOT fucking DIE

dNfD is a game about not allowing yourself to perish. Even when all odds are against you. EVEN when defeat is certain.

Here you play as Willow, Captain of The Commune of Greenville, of the now balkanized USA. The last bastion of the revolution. It's future, is in your hands.

Objectives
  1. DO. NOT. FUCKING. DIE.
  2. Defeat all enemies.
Controls
  1. WASD to move.
  2. MOUSE to aim and shoot.
  3. R to reload.
  4. ESC to pause the game. 

(Includes gamepad support)

Credits
  • Nasty[REDACTED] - Menu Art & Game Design & Playtesting
  • Temi Lucila - Game Design & Playtesting
  • Felipe Vega - He taped together the rest

This game is a submission for DEMONMAMA's ULTIMATE LEFTY LGBTQ+ GUN MEME CONTEST.
